artificialneuralnetworks

Class ANN

  • java.lang.Object
    • artificialneuralnetworks.ANN

  • public class ANN
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Sandeep,Snehal AIM : To apply neural network learning to the problem of face recognition. To build a sunglasses recognizer, a face recognizer, and a pose recognizer.

      • imageHandler

        public static void imageHandler(java.lang.String filename,
                                Network net,
                                int mode)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        filename - : The filename which contains a list of image locations from which we will read the images
        mode - : 1 = Sun glasses predictor 2 = Face Recognizer 3 = Pose Recognizer
        net - : The network on which we are currently working
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • handlingTestData

        public static void handlingTestData(java.lang.String filename,
                                    Network net,
                                    int mode,
                                    Validation validation)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        filename - : the filename in which we have the testing data
        net - : the neural network on which we will be testing
        mode - : 1 = Sun glasses predictor 2 = Face Recognizer 3 = Pose Recognizer
        validation - : A utility class to see how many correct and wrong predictions the model has made.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • genTargetVector

        public static double[] genTargetVector(java.lang.String line,
                                       int mode)
        Parameters:
        line - : file path of the image whose target vector we want to create
        mode - : 1. Sunglasses 2. Face Recognizer 3. Pose Recognizer
        Returns:
        the target vector

      • calcAccuracy

        public static void calcAccuracy(int correct,
                                int wrong,
                                int mode,
                                java.lang.String filename)
        Parameters:
        correct - : No of correct predictions
        wrong - : No of wrong predictions
        mode - : 1. Sunglasses 2. Face Recognizer 3. Pose Recognizer
        filename - : The test set on which the model is predicting
